mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popular_board(board_id, ranking, updated_at) SELECT id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY view_count DESC) as ranking, NOW() FROM board ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.created_at, b.updated_at, p.ranking, p.updated_at FROM popular_board p JOIN board b ON board_id = b.id ORDER BY p.ranking ASC
